vehicleId.description:
Vehicle Id
Required: true
vehicleId can be retrieved from /car/search endpoint(data->search_results->vehicle_info->v_id)
Ex: 678151356

searchKey.description:
Search key
Required: true
searchKey can be retrieved from /car/search endpoint(data->search_key)
Ex:


units.description:
Units
Ex: metric
Default value: metric

metric: Metric (km, m2)
imperial: Imperial (miles, ft2)

languageCode.description:
Language
languageCode can be retrieved from /languages endpoint(data->code)
Ex: en-us
Default value: en-us

currencyCode.description:
Currency
currencyCode can be retrieved from /currencies endpoint(data->code)
Ex: USD
Default value: HOTEL(Property's Currency)

countryFlag.description:
Country
countryFlag can be retrieved from /languages endpoint(data->countryFlag)
Ex: us
Default value: us

required.query: I'm considering renting a car with vehicle ID 678151356 and I'd like to see the reviews and ratings for the supplier. Can you help me with that?

bgo_error.message: Cannot retrieve a vehicle for search key '' and vehicle id '678151356'

optional.query: I'm considering renting a car with vehicle ID 678151356 and I'd like to see the reviews and ratings for the supplier. I have the search key ''. Could you provide the reviews in English, with distances in kilometers and prices in US dollars?

bgo_error.message: Cannot retrieve a vehicle for search key '' and vehicle id '678151356'
